item.title: Online Constrained Convex Optimization using Mirror Descent
item.description:
Location

This project started as part of my summer research internship at IITK's SPiN Lab under Prof. Ketan Rajawat. Since then, we have designed two novel algorithms and are currently working on suitable experiments and writing the paper, which we hope to finish and submit soon.

item.title: Video Generation using Multimodal VAE
item.description:
Location

This was my second undergraduate research project under Prof. Vinay P. Namboodiri, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Kanpur, which I took up after completing his course CS 783 : Visual Recognition in the Spring ‘19 term.

item.title: Conceptual motivation of MCMC using Hamiltonian Dynamics
item.description:
Location

This was my first undergraduate research project under Prof. Satyadev Nandakumar, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Kanpur, which I took up concurrently with his course CS 687 : Algorithmic Information Theory in the Spring ‘19 term.

item.title: Restart strategies for SGD
item.description:
Location

This was a research project at EPFL's MLO Lab, mentored by Prof. Martin Jaggi and Prof. Aymeric Dieulevieut during my semester exchange at EPFL in the fall of 2018.

item.title: Creating face caricatures
item.description:
Location

This project was done as part of the course EE604 : Image Processing in the Spring ‘18 term at IIT Kanpur under Prof. K S Venkatesh, Department of Electrical Engineering, IIT Kanpur.

item.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Atari Games
item.description:
Location

This project was done as part of the course CS771: Machine Learning Techniques, in the Fall ‘17 term at IIT Kanpur under Prof. Purushottam Kar, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Kanpur.

item.title: Small variance asymptotics for non-parametric Bayesian clustering
item.description:
Location

This project was done as part of the course CS698X: Topics in Probabilistic Machine Learning and Inference, in the Spring ‘18 term at IIT Kanpur under Prof. Piyush Rai, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Kanpur.
